statements: SELECT * FROM MessageLog WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM MessageLog WHERE receiver_id = 2;
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id FROM MessageLog WHERE message_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM MessageLog WHERE receiver_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_id, COUNT(*) AS message_count FROM MessageLog GROUP BY sender_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM MessageLog ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id FROM MessageLog WHERE sender_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT message_text FROM MessageLog WHERE receiver_id = 200 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-07-01'
SELECT * FROM MessageLog WHERE sender_id = 300 OR receiver_id = 400 ORDER BY sender_id ASC, timestamp DESC
SELECT COUNT(message_id) AS total_messages FROM MessageLog
SELECT * FROM messages;
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id FROM messages WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM messages WHERE receiver_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_text, timestamp FROM chat_logs WHERE user_id = 1 AND room_id = 3;
SELECT log_id, timestamp FROM chat_logs WHERE room_id = 4 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id, message_text, timestamp FROM messages WHERE message_id = 10;
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM messages WHERE sender_id = 101 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM chat_logs WHERE room_id = 20 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, log_text FROM chat_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT message_id, receiver_id FROM messages WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND sender_id <> receiver_id;
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM messages WHERE sender_id = 'c275528a-2039-4a57-aaed-2b9b7c740589';
SELECT * FROM messages WHERE receiver_id = 'e2595782-9b90-4ad4-bd8c-8b480432104d' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT sender_id, COUNT(*) FROM chat_logs GROUP BY sender_id;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM messages WHERE sender_id = 'c275528a-2039-4a57-aaed-2b9b7c740589' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM messages WHERE sender_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT message_id, message_text, timestamp FROM messages WHERE receiver_id = '234e5678-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;

SELECT users.username, messages.message_text, chat_logs.timestamp FROM users JOIN messages ON users.user_id = messages.sender_id JOIN chat_logs ON messages.message_id = chat_logs.message_id WHERE users.username = 'Alice' ORDER BY chat_logs.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM chat_logs WHERE chat_id = '345e6789-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2021-06-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT sender_id, COUNT(message_id) AS message_count FROM messages GROUP BY sender_id ORDER BY message_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM message_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message_text FROM message_history WHERE sender_id = 123;
SELECT file_name, size, uploaded_by FROM attachment_files WHERE uploaded_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT chat_name, participants FROM chat_logs WHERE participants && ARRAY['Alice', 'Bob'];
SELECT username, full_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM message_history WHERE sender_id = 100;
SELECT message_text, sender_id, receiver_id FROM message_history WHERE timestamp > '2022-09-01';
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, timestamp FROM message_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT u.username, u.full_name, u.email, COUNT(m.message_id) AS message_count FROM user_profiles u INNER JOIN message_history m ON u.user_id = m.sender_id GROUP BY u.username, u.full_name, u.email;
SELECT a.file_name, a.size, u.username AS uploaded_by FROM attachment_files a INNER JOIN user_profiles u ON a.uploaded_by = u.user_id WHERE a.uploaded_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM messages;
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id, sent_at FROM messages WHERE receiver_id = '8a0065bc-6ea1-4ce8-aea1-c97171931b19';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY display_name ASC;
SELECT attachment_id, attachment_url FROM attachments WHERE message_id = '7b34ad82-8385-4e72-9740-1e53b7e9a27b';
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM activities ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM messages
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id, sent_at FROM messages ORDER BY sent_at DESC
SELECT message_text, sent_at FROM messages WHERE sender_id = 'c0f6d57f-9d01-4db1-88f4-656ff7d72f43'
SELECT * FROM conversations WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' AND JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(participants) > 2
SELECT attachment_url FROM attachments WHERE message_id = '5a8b5666-2357-4737-bc89-a95f47cc4771' ORDER BY attachment_id ASC
